steps.title: Welcome to the Gnosis VPN self-onboarding guide
steps.text:
Welcome to the Gnosis VPN self-onboarding. 

 This guide will walk you step by step through setting up and using Gnosis VPN. It is a privacy-respecting web app and does not track you by default. On each step, you can continue with “I’m ok to move on”. If something does not work or feels unclear, use “I encountered a problem and need help” to see additional guidance, including a short help video. You can optionally opt in to saving your progress and feedback on our servers to help us improve the product. If you do, we minimize collected data and protect it carefully. Details are explained in our privacy policy. You are in control at every step.

Your secret token is {{host.secretToken}}.

steps.title: Download the app
steps.text:
Next, you will download the Gnosis VPN installer.

This is a one-time installer process that will install the VPN on your system and prepare everything needed to connect securely.

Gnosis VPN is currently available for macOS and Linux. Support for Windows and Android is planned for later this year.

Once the download is complete, run the installer to continue with the setup.

steps.title: Install the app
steps.text: Follow the installer steps for your device.

steps.title: Launch Gnosis VPN
steps.text: Open the app from your home screen or app drawer.

steps.title: Fund your account.
steps.text:
Next, you need to fund your Gnosis VPN account.

Gnosis VPN requires wxHOPR tokens on Gnosis Chain to operate. These tokens are used to pay for VPN usage.

You can fund the account yourself by transferring wxHOPR to your personal funding address, or you can use our provided funding tool to acquire and fund it directly.

Your personal funding token is {{host.secretToken}}.

link.label: Gnosis VPN Funding Tool for testers

steps.title: Grant permissions
steps.text: Allow the VPN permission prompt so the app can create a secure tunnel.

steps.title: Verify your profile
steps.text: Confirm your profile details and security settings.

steps.title: Connect to the VPN
steps.text: Tap connect to start the secure tunnel.

steps.title: Verify your connection
steps.text: Confirm that your IP address has changed.

steps.title: You are ready
steps.text: Your VPN is active. Keep the app running for protection.
